title: Beta Client Do not Download (Upgrade)
body:
I recently reinstalled league onto my computer and pressed that upgrade to beta button on the prompt but nothing happens. 

And when I press the play button, a message pops up saying "please reinstall league alpha client to start again."

I tried restarting my client and now the prompt doesn't even show. I have to reinstall league to have the upgrade prompt to show again.

How can I upgrade to beta client.

replies.body:
This specific error crops up when something went wrong during the patching process. You'll have to complete a clean reinstallation of League by specifically following [**this guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) in order to resolve this.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Ok so i followed the guide and used hextech repair to re-install league of legends. The beta client download and update started fine but the number is stuck on 87% for like 4 hours and when I hover my mouse on it, it says "Applying Patches ETA 5 min". 

And when I close my client, im bk to ground zero.

Any solutions?

Issues at this point in patching usually point towards an *unstable connection* to our patching servers. Working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) typically resolves these issues, so I recommend working through those steps.

I hope this fixed the problem!
Same problem here, have tried it 4 times now this week. please fix this problem.
